OK, so if I join,  What would I be doing? As in, what job would I be needing 
to carry out?  OK, Megs is in another body, Shredder is in command until 
Megs gets another body,  and what is there for me to do other than kick 
A-Bot butt?

At the current moment, I am standing in the woods listening to Megs talk to 
someone(can't remember who he was talking to)
-DarkMouse



>
>okay, Sinesis is mine, he's the best in the group (LOL) but he isn't leader
>and doesn't want to be leader.....the leader currently is Shredder,
>Quickstrike is also in the group, Megatron is on a top secret mission as a
>diagnostic drone after Rattrap destroyed his body and he'll be back to be
>leader again....what else do you need to know?......
